On Tue, 8 Jul 2003, Daniel Paul Hightower wrote:

> Well, I discovered the limit for mages.  When you get to strength
> level 21934, any strength beyond that point is *free*.
>
> (I'm just curious how the limits for determing what stats cost money
> came across.)

How many times did you have to sit there pressing right-click for that?
:-)

Could you send me a save file with a character of that strength, possibly?
I'm all for testing and fixing it, but 21934 is one heck of a number for a
stat. Cheating or not, the mouse and finger work would take a while.

- Yan
